variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Cohort Identifier

variable.name: pr4spec
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by Equipment problem but no foot pedal problem/cuff sequence problem or Doppler problem specify the problem.
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT test done version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: pr7spec
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by another problem, specify the other problem.
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT test done version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PLATEX
variable.description: Do you have a latex allergy?

variable.name: PRAYNAUD
variable.description: Do you have active Raynaud's disease, as manifested by daily attacks of Raynaud's, currently blue fingers or ischemic finger ulcers?

variable.name: PMASTECT
variable.description: Women only: Have you had a radical mastectomy on right side?
variable.comment: A radical mastectomy is the removal of the breast, associated lymph nodes, and underlying musculature. Does not include lumpectomy or simple mastectomy. PMASTECT modified - to preserve confidentiality.
variable.value: Yes, right side, left side or both sides

variable.name: PCAFFEIN
variable.description: Have you had any caffeinated drinks in the last 6 hours?

variable.name: PCUPS
variable.description: If "yes" to PCAFFEIN: How many cups?
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PFOOD
variable.description: Have you eaten anything else including a fat free cereal bar this morning?

variable.name: PCIG6HR
variable.description: Have you smoked cigarettes in the last 6 hours?

variable.name: PCIGHR
variable.description: If "yes" to PICG6HR: How many hours and minutes since your last cigarette?
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.
variable.value: none or did not smoke in last 6 hours

variable.name: PCIGMIN
variable.description: If "yes" to PICG6HR: How many hours and minutes since your last cigarette?
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.
variable.value: none or did not smoke in last 6 hours

variable.name: PTEMP
variable.description: Room temperature
variable.comment: Use in conjunction with REMARK1 from data portion. Discrepancies between REMARK1 and PTEMP were not resolved, use with caution.

variable.name: PSBP
variable.description: Mean systolic baseline blood pressure
variable.comment: Use in conjunction with variable SBP for a complete set of systolic blood pressure.

variable.name: PCUFF
variable.description: Cuff inflation pressure
variable.comment: Baseline SBP + 50 or 250

variable.name: PDONE
variable.description: Was PAT protocol completed? (Determined at time of scan or at time of interpreting)

variable.name: PREAS1
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by subject refusal.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PREAS2
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by subject discomfort.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PREAS3
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by time constraint.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PREAS4
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by equipment problem.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PREAS5
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by foot pedal problem/cuff sequence problem.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PREAS6
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by doppler problem.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: PREAS7
variable.description: If no (0) or partial (2) to PDONE: PAT scan deviation was caused by an other problem.
variable.comment: version 1 6/24/2010 Changed the variable description to be more meaningful.

variable.name: begocc
variable.description: Start time of Occlusion
variable.comment: BEGOCC was originally coded as min:sec

variable.name: endocc
variable.description: End time of Occlusion
variable.comment: ENDOCC was originallly coded as min:sec

variable.name: occdur
variable.description: Occlusion duration
variable.comment: Should be 5 minutes, acceptable to 5 minutes 30 seconds OCCDUR was originally coded as min:sec.

variable.name: bldur
variable.description: Duration of the recorded Baseline
variable.comment: BLDUR originally coded as min:sec

variable.name: blroi
variable.description: Duration of the Baseline segment taken for calculation of mean Baseline amplitude
variable.comment: ROI = Region of Interest BLROI originally coded as min:sec.

variable.name: sigdur
variable.description: Duration of whole study
variable.comment: SIGDUR originally coded as min:sec

variable.name: warnerr
variable.description: Warnings/Errors
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT not done

variable.name: error
variable.description: Error
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT not done

variable.name: warning
variable.description: Warnings
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT not done

variable.name: result
variable.description: PAT Result/RH index (ratio)

variable.name: hr
variable.description: Baseline heart rate

variable.name: ai
variable.description: Augmentation Index
variable.comment: Calculated as the percent difference between first and second peaks of the signal waveform

variable.name: ai_n
variable.description: Augmentation Index Pulses
variable.comment: Number of pulses from which the average waveform that is used in the AI calculation was driven

variable.name: ai_t1
variable.description: Point of time at which the first peak occurs as measured from the initiaion of the averaged waveform

variable.name: ai_t2
variable.description: Point of time at which the second peak occurs as measured from the initiation of the averaged waveform

variable.name: validbl
variable.description: Percent valid signals during baseline
variable.comment: Used to calculate score

variable.name: validsig
variable.description: Percent valid signals during post occlusion
variable.comment: Used to calculate score

variable.name: occbord
variable.description: Occlusion borders
variable.comment: Shows where occlusion border is manually corrected in cases where the automatic analysis did not detect correct borders blank=unknown or PAT not done. version 1 6/24/2010 changed coded value from "." to "blank"

variable.name: dbp
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure entered by technician

variable.name: sbp
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure entered by technician
variable.comment: SBP was recorded after the start of the study, there are a lot of missing values. Use in conjunction with PSBP from the worksheet for a complete set of systolic blood pressures

variable.name: meanblo
variable.description: Baseline average amplitude of the occluded side
variable.comment: This unit of volume was not standardized to any regular volume units

variable.name: o0_30
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 0 to 30 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o30_60
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 30 to 60 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o60_90
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 60 to 90 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o90_120
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 90 to 120 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o120_150
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 120 to 150 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o150_180
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 150 to 180 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o180_210
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 180 to 210 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o210_240
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 210 to 240 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o240_270
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 240 to 270 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o270_300
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 270 to 300 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o300_330
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 300 to 330 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o330_360
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 330 to 360 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o360_390
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 360 to 390 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side

variable.name: o390_420
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 390 to 420 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the occluded side
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable

variable.name: meanblc
variable.description: Baseline average amplitude of the control side
variable.comment: This unit of volume was not standardized to any regular volume units

variable.name: c0_30
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 0 to 30 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c30_60
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 30 to 60 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c60_90
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 60 to 90 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c90_120
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 90 to 120 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c120_150
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 120 to 150 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c150_180
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 150 to 180 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c180_210
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 180 to 210 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c210_240
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 210 to 240 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c240_270
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 240 to 270 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c270_300
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 270 to 300 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c300_330
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 300 to 330 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c330_360
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 330 to 360 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c360_390
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 360 to 390 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side

variable.name: c390_420
variable.description: Ratio between mean amplitude of segment 390 to 420 seconds post occlusion to the baseline amplitude on the control side
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable

variable.name: recvers
variable.description: Software version of recording
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT not done

variable.name: anvers
variable.description: Software version of analysis
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT not done

variable.name: warnno
variable.description: Number of warnings

variable.name: testqual
variable.description: Test Quality

variable.name: occqual
variable.description: Occlusion Quality

variable.name: hr0_30
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 0 to 30

variable.name: hr30_60
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 30 to 60

variable.name: hr60_90
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 60 to 90

variable.name: hr90_120
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 90 to 120

variable.name: hr120_150
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 120 to 150

variable.name: hr150_180
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 150 to 180

variable.name: hr180_210
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 180 to 210
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable

variable.name: hr210_240
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 210 to 240
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: hr240_270
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 240 to 270
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: hr270_300
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 270 to 300
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: hr300_330
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 300 to 330
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: hr330_360
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 330 to 360
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: hr360_390
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 360 to 390
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: hr390_420
variable.description: Heart rate of segment 390 to 420
variable.comment: All data missing for this variable.

variable.name: remark2
variable.description: Remark 2 (fingernail condition)
variable.comment: BLANK=unknown or PAT not done
variable.value: Fingernail more then 0.5 cm beyond tip of finger

variable.name: remark1
variable.description: Remark 1 (room temperature)
variable.comment: Use in conjunction with PTEMP from worksheet. Discrepancies between REMARK1 and PTEMP were not resolved, use with caution. BLANK=unknown or PAT not done.

variable.name: rectime
variable.description: Recording time of day, military time
variable.comment: RECTIME originaly coded as hrs:min

variable.name: pdate
variable.description: Date of PAT scan
variable.comment: PDATE modified - Number of days since Exam 1

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: SHARe ID Number
